summary:
Liverpool F.C. is an English soccer team founded in 1892. They play in the Premier League, the country's top division. The team is based in Liverpool and has a rich history, winning many titles.

They've dominated both domestic and international competitions, with numerous league titles, FA Cups, and European trophies. The club's iconic red kit and anthem, "You'll Never Walk Alone," were introduced in the 1960s. Liverpool has passionate fans and intense rivalries with Everton and Manchester United.

Unfortunately, the club has also experienced tragedies, including the Heysel and Hillsborough disasters, which led to important changes in soccer safety measures.
title: Liverpool F.C.
